dublinCore.dc:title: 111 S546 IS: Technical Correction to the Shoshone-Paiute Tribes of the Duck Valley Reservation Water Rights Settlement Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Cortez Masto introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to make a technical correction to the water rights settlement for the Shoshone-Paiute Tribes of the Duck Valley Reservation, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Technical Correction to the Shoshone-Paiute Tribes of the Duck Valley Reservation Water Rights Settlement Act of 2025.

section.header: Authorization of payment of adjusted interest on Development Fund
section.text: Section 10807(b)(3) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–11; 123 Stat. 1409) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking There is and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary for deposit into the Development Fund $5,124,902.12.
